post_summaries.description: The image shows a rectangular vegan pizza on a baking sheet. The pizza has a golden-brown crust and is topped with tomato sauce, cherry tomatoes cut in half, fresh arugula, and what appears to be vegan feta cheese. A pizza cutter is visible next to the pizza.
The image shows a close-up of several small, golden-brown pastries topped with sesame seeds, sitting in white paper liners. The pastries appear to be vegan, based on the hashtags used in the post.
The image shows a close-up of vegan pastries (past√©is) and vegan pizza (p√£o pizza) being sold at what appears to be a fair or market. There are signs indicating the ingredients and prices.

The image shows two baked pizza rolls or stuffed bread loaves. A handwritten sign lists ingredients in Portuguese, including "Massa Pizza, Molho Tomate, Sabor Mozzarella." The hashtags indicate it is a vegan recipe.

The image shows two types of vegan cake: one is a chocolate swirl loaf, and the other is a blueberry cake. A sign in the background lists ingredients, indicating they are selling these baked goods. The hashtags in the post also indicate it is vegan, bio/organic, and from Portugal.

The image shows a variety of vegan pastries and savory snacks at a food stand in Coimbra, Portugal. There are "P√£o Pizza Mozzarella", "P√£o Pizza Tofu Fumado", "Past√©is" and "Empada de Legumes c/ Tofu" (vegetable and tofu pies) on display with price tags.
